item.title: Junction of Chamberlain St/Regents Park Rd/Sharples Hall St in middle of road., 21st December
item.description:
There is a raised sewer vent. The road has subsided around this vent. In the early morning truck go over the vent and the whole area shakes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 146, Regent's Park Road, Chalk Farm, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wait button isn’t working., 21st December
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing close to Hackney Central station is not working properly. The wait button is always on, even without the wait button being pressed. It stays red all the time even while it’s green for pedestrians, and when the seconds countdown is happening (as shown in first foto). This means the pedestrian traffic light turns green at least every minute or so, and cars have to stop wait for nothing. It has been like this for weeks at least and exacerbates the already dreadful congestion on Graham Road. Please fix.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 216, Graham Road, Hackney, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flat at 41 Nunhead Lane, 21st December
item.description:
Because if the recent road works the communal bins at the block of flats have not been emptied. Plus there is now stuff from fly tipping and my disabled daughter who lives in one of the flats can’t get to the bins to empty her rubbish plesss arrange to have to have this removed as soon as possible
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Nunhead Lane, Nunhead, Greater London

item.title: Food Waste Bins accumulating, 21st December
item.description:
